title: Draven with Runaan's Hurricane -
body:
He throws Axes and Arrows shoot off to the sides.

Sorry it looks to funny, can't get over this.

Looks OP.

GG Draven with Runaan's. Can't lane vs him too busy laughing at fact he has the item to begin with, fact he throws axes and peripherally launches arrows and also because he looks like a spastic when he throws his axes anyway so the arrows shooting off to the sides are the icing on the cake.

replies.body: Turns out Vel and Azir also shoot arrows

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=m95EEu3M,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-03-25T02:52:32.835+0000)
>
> Turns out Vel and Azir also shoot arrows

The effect looks the same for everyone who is ranged.
That's what it always looked like to me.
